title: Pilgrims Of Sorrow
description: Pilgrims of Sorrow journey from India to Africa, to the South East sharing seven stories. A colour stains every story and voices an emotion. Traversing through the prisms of their lives, the characters stumble and scatter into myriad colours. They hum hopeful songs, finding solace and redemption only through a pilgrimage of sorrow! Pilgrims of Sorrow is a mosaic of tiny mirrors from broken hearts and if you find little reflections of your own longing soul, don't be surprised!
author: Inderjit S Paintal
